languages.text: [Солгать] "Верные слуги! Проклятые ксеносы попытались лишить вас свое{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ьницы}! Но их план провалился! Я вновь с вами! А вы — со мной?!"

traits.locale_text: [Солгать] "Верные слуги! Проклятые ксеносы попытались лишить вас свое{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ьницы}! Но их план провалился! Я вновь с вами! А вы — со мной?!"

languages.text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"
languages.original_text: [Солгать] "Верные слуги! Проклятые ксеносы попытались лишить вас свое{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ьницы}! Но их план провалился! Я вновь с вами! А вы — со мной?!"

traits.locale_text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos have tried to take your leader away from you! But their plan has failed! I am with you again! Are you with me?"
[Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos have tried to take your leader away from you! But their plan has failed! I am with you again! Are you with me?"
[Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"
[Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"
[Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"
[Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"

languages.text: [Mentir] «¡Mis leales sirvientes! ¡Los malditos xenos han intentado arrebataros a vuestro líder! ¡Pero su plan ha fracasado! ¡Heme aquí, de nuevo con vosotros! ¿Estáis vosotros conmigo?».
languages.original_text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Mentir] «¡Mis leales sirvientes! ¡Los malditos xenos han intentado arrebataros a vuestro líder! ¡Pero su plan ha fracasado! ¡Heme aquí, de nuevo con vosotros! ¿Estáis vosotros conmigo?».

languages.text: [说谎]“我忠诚的仆人们！那些该死的异形打算夺走你们的领袖，但他们的阴谋破产了！现在，我又回到了你们身边！你们愿意继续追随我吗？”
languages.original_text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [说谎]“我忠诚的仆人们！那些该死的异形打算夺走你们的领袖，但他们的阴谋破产了！现在，我又回到了你们身边！你们愿意继续追随我吗？”

languages.text: [Mentir] « Mes fidèles serviteurs ! Ces maudits xénos ont tenté d'enlever votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais leur plan a échoué et me voici de nouveau parmi vous ! Êtes-vous avec moi ? »
languages.original_text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Mentir] « Mes fidèles serviteurs ! Ces maudits xénos ont tenté d'enlever votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais leur plan a échoué et me voici de nouveau parmi vous ! Êtes-vous avec moi ? »

languages.text: [嘘をつく]「我が忠実なるしもべよ！呪われし異種族は、諸君らからリーダーを奪おうとした！しかし、彼らの計画は失敗した！私は再び諸君らと共にある！諸君らは私についてくるか？」
languages.original_text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [嘘をつく]「我が忠実なるしもべよ！呪われし異種族は、諸君らからリーダーを奪おうとした！しかし、彼らの計画は失敗した！私は再び諸君らと共にある！諸君らは私についてくるか？」

languages.text: [Lügen] "Meine treuen Diener! Die verfluchten Xenos haben versucht, Euch {mf|Euren Anführer|Eure Anführerin} wegzunehmen! Doch ihr Plan ist gescheitert! Ich stehe wieder an Eurer Seite! Steht auch Ihr an meiner Seite?"
languages.original_text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Lügen] "Meine treuen Diener! Die verfluchten Xenos haben versucht, Euch {mf|Euren Anführer|Eure Anführerin} wegzunehmen! Doch ihr Plan ist gescheitert! Ich stehe wieder an Eurer Seite! Steht auch Ihr an meiner Seite?"

languages.text: [Yalan söyle] "Sadık hizmetkârlarım! Uğursuz zenolar, liderinizi elinizden almaya çalıştı! Fakat planları başarısız oldu! Bir kez daha sizlerleyim! Sizler de benimle misiniz?"
languages.original_text: [Lie] "My loyal servants! The accursed xenos tried to take your leader from you! But their plan has failed! I am once again with you! Are you with me?"

traits.locale_text: [Yalan söyle] "Sadık hizmetkârlarım! Uğursuz zenolar, liderinizi elinizden almaya çalıştı! Fakat planları başarısız oldu! Bir kez daha sizlerleyim! Sizler de benimle misiniz?"
